message.name: INF_ISSUECONCERNPMTS_SUB
message.locale: Report from IssueConcernPayments batch job run on %1s as %2s.

message.name: INF_TOTAL_PRODPROVIDER_PROCESSED
message.locale: Total number of Product Provider records processed: %1n

message.name: INF_TOTAL_SERVSUPPLIER_PROCESSED
message.locale: Total number of Service Supplier records processed: %1n

message.name: INF_TOTAL_UTILITY_PROCESSED
message.locale: Total number of Utility records processed: %1n

message.name: INF_TOTAL_PERSON_PROCESSED
message.locale: Total number of Person records processed: %1n

message.name: INF_TOTAL_EMPLOYER_PROCESSED
message.locale: Total number of Employer records processed: %1n

message.name: INF_TOTAL_INFOPROVIDER_PROCESSED
message.locale: Total number of Information Provider records processed: %1n

message.name: INF_TOTAL_REPRESENTATIVE_PROCESSED
message.locale: Total number of Representative records processed: %1n

message.name: INF_TOTAL_EXTERNALPARTY_PROCESSED
message.locale: Total number of External Party records processed: %1n

message.name: INF_ISSUE_CONC_PAYMENTS
message.locale: IssueConcernPayments

message.name: ERR_FC_FV_SKIPPED_DUE_TO_INACTIVE_ADDRESS_SUBJECT
message.locale: Payment for %1s, reference number %2n, could not be issued as address data has expired.

message.name: ERR_FC_FV_SKIPPED_DUE_TO_INACTIVE_ADDRESS_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: A payment for %1s could not be issued as the address specified for delivery of payment is no longer applicable. The address in question is %2s and it was set to end on %3s for %4s. Note the payment will continue to fail until a current address is recorded.

message.name: ERR_FC_FV_SKIPPED_DUE_TO_INACTIVE_ADDRESS
message.locale: Payment for %1s, reference number %2n, could not be issued as address data has expired. A task was sent to the owner to followup on this issue.

message.name: ERR_FC_FV_SKIPPED_DUE_TO_INACTIVE_BANK_SUBJECT
message.locale: Payment for %1s, reference number %2n, could not be issued as bank account data has expired.

message.name: ERR_FC_FV_SKIPPED_DUE_TO_INACTIVE_BANK_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: A payment for %1s could not be issued as the bank account specified for delivery of payment is no longer applicable. The bank account in question is: account number %2n, sort code %3s and it was set to end on %4s for %5s. Note the payment will continue to fail until a current bank account is recorded.

message.name: ERR_FC_FV_SKIPPED_DUE_TO_INACTIVE_BANK_ACCOUNT
message.locale: Payment for %1s, reference number %2n, could not be issued as bank account data has expired. A task was sent to the owner to followup on this issue.

message.name: ERR_FC_FV_SKIPPED_DUE_TO_NO_BANK_ACCOUNT
message.locale: Payment for %1s, reference number %2n, could not be issued as bank account data does not exist. A task was sent to the owner to followup on this issue.

message.name: ERR_FC_FV_SKIPPED_DUE_TO_NO_BANK_ACCOUNT_SUBJECT
message.locale: Payment for %1s, reference number %2n, could not be issued as bank account data does not exist.

message.name: ERR_FC_FV_SKIPPED_DUE_TO_NO_BANK_ACCOUNT_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: Payment for %1s, reference number %2n, could not be issued as bank account data does not exist. Note the payment will continue to fail until a current bank account is recorded.

message.name: ERR_FC_FV_SKIPPED_DUE_TO_INACTIVE_BANK_IBAN_DESCRIPTION
message.locale: A payment for %1s could not be issued as the bank account specified for delivery of payment is no longer applicable. The bank account in question is: IBAN %2n, BIC %3s and it was set to end on %4s for %5s. Note the payment will continue to fail until a current bank account is recorded.
